pr_title: [BEAM-2822, BEAM-2939, BEAM-6189, BEAM-4374] Enable passing completed and remaining amounts of work using new metrics format for splittable dofns in the Python SDK.

timeline.bodyText:
a bit surprised there is no testing file corresponding to operations.py.
Maybe I missed something?
timeline.author: HuangLED
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -812,6 +813,36 @@ def progress_metrics(self):
           current_element_progress.fraction_remaining)
     return metrics
 
+  def monitoring_infos(self, transform_id):

replies.bodyText:
Your not wrong, there is no operations_test.py.
A bunch of the testing in the Python SDK relies on pipeline level tests which test execution e2e.
replies.author: lukecwik
